newsitem.title: USA: Fidelity names new Select Regional Banks manager.
newsitem.headline: Fidelity names new Select Regional Banks manager.

text.p: Fidelity Investments on Tuesday named John Avery the new portfolio manager of Fidelity Select Regional Banks Portfolio, replacing Remy Trafelet.
Trafelet, 26, is leaving to join the Fort Lee, N.J.-based investment management firm of Boston Provident Partners.
Avery, 32, will continue to manage Fidelity Select Chemicals Portfolio, which he has managed since 1995.

The Select Banks Portfolio, whose top holdings include Bank America, Chase Manhattan, Wells Fargo, Citicorp and Bank of New York, is one of 36 different sector funds offered by Fidelity, the nation's largest mutual fund company.
